mapper.select: SELECT f.`publication`,f.`check_no`,c.`company_name` ,f.content FROM flight_check f,company c,product p WHERE p.`company_id`=c.`id` AND f.`product_id`=p.`product_id`;
SELECT c.`company_name`,p.`product_name`,f.`attention`,f.`punish` ,f.content FROM flight_check f,company c,product p WHERE p.`company_id`=c.`id` AND f.`product_id`=p.`product_id`AND c.`id`=#{id};
